entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
